languages.text: "Пусть слово мое несет тахионный ветер, пусть отразится оно в океанах субатомного резонанса и звучит, пока не состарится свет". {n}Металлическое тело начинает сотрясаться в конвульсиях, и вся гробница сотрясается вместе с ним. Стены кажутся все более непрочными с каждой секундой, и невозможные аномалии охватывают их с удвоенной силой.{/n} "Проклятие династии Йекхмет".

"May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"
languages.original_text: "Пусть слово мое несет тахионный ветер, пусть отразится оно в океанах субатомного резонанса и звучит, пока не состарится свет". {n}Металлическое тело начинает сотрясаться в конвульсиях, и вся гробница сотрясается вместе с ним. Стены кажутся все более непрочными с каждой секундой, и невозможные аномалии охватывают их с удвоенной силой.{/n} "Проклятие династии Йекхмет".

traits.locale_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to shake the metallic body, and the entire crypt is shaking with it. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "A curse upon the Yekhmet dynasty."

"May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to shake the metallic body, and the entire crypt is shaking with it. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "A curse upon the Yekhmet dynasty."

The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

"May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

languages.text: « Puisse le vent tachyonique porter mes mots, et puissent les océans de résonance subatomique les répéter jusqu'à ce que le monde soit vieux. » {n}Les convulsions commencent à affecter le corps métallique qui fait trembler toute la crypte. Chaque seconde qui passe semble fragiliser les murs, qui présentent maintenant un grand nombre d'anomalies impossibles.{/n} « Maudite soit la dynastie Yekhmet ! »
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

traits.locale_text: « Puisse le vent tachyonique porter mes mots, et puissent les océans de résonance subatomique les répéter jusqu'à ce que le monde soit vieux. » {n}Les convulsions commencent à affecter le corps métallique qui fait trembler toute la crypte. Chaque seconde qui passe semble fragiliser les murs, qui présentent maintenant un grand nombre d'anomalies impossibles.{/n} « Maudite soit la dynastie Yekhmet ! »

languages.text: «Que el viento taquiónico traslade mis palabras, los océanos con su resonancia subatómica las reflejen y así resuenen hasta que el mundo envejezca». {n}Las convulsiones comienzan a afectar al cuerpo metálico y toda la cripta se estremece a su paso. Las paredes parecen más frágiles a cada segundo que pasa. Ahora en ellas surgen anomalías imposibles a un ritmo rampante.{/n} «¡Yo maldigo a la dinastía Yekhmet!».
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

traits.locale_text: «Que el viento taquiónico traslade mis palabras, los océanos con su resonancia subatómica las reflejen y así resuenen hasta que el mundo envejezca». {n}Las convulsiones comienzan a afectar al cuerpo metálico y toda la cripta se estremece a su paso. Las paredes parecen más frágiles a cada segundo que pasa. Ahora en ellas surgen anomalías imposibles a un ritmo rampante.{/n} «¡Yo maldigo a la dinastía Yekhmet!».

languages.text: “愿我的话语在超光速粒子之风中飘逝，愿亚原子共振的海洋不断回响，直到这个世界结束。”{n}这只异形金属制成的身体抽搐起来，整个地穴都在随之颤抖。每过一秒，地穴的墙壁都变得更加脆弱，光怪陆离的反常现象在墙壁之中肆意回荡。{/n}“愿叶赫迈特王朝遭到诅咒！”
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

traits.locale_text: “愿我的话语在超光速粒子之风中飘逝，愿亚原子共振的海洋不断回响，直到这个世界结束。”{n}这只异形金属制成的身体抽搐起来，整个地穴都在随之颤抖。每过一秒，地穴的墙壁都变得更加脆弱，光怪陆离的反常现象在墙壁之中肆意回荡。{/n}“愿叶赫迈特王朝遭到诅咒！”

languages.text: 「タキオンの風が我が言葉を運び、素粒子の海がそれを反射し、世界が老いさらばえるまでそれを響かせん」{n}痙攣が金属の体に影響を及ぼし始め、地下墓地全体が震える。壁が少しずつもろくなっていく。あり得ざる異常が、その地を蹂躙していく。{/n}「イェクメト王朝に呪いあれ！」
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

traits.locale_text: 「タキオンの風が我が言葉を運び、素粒子の海がそれを反射し、世界が老いさらばえるまでそれを響かせん」{n}痙攣が金属の体に影響を及ぼし始め、地下墓地全体が震える。壁が少しずつもろくなっていく。あり得ざる異常が、その地を蹂躙していく。{/n}「イェクメト王朝に呪いあれ！」

languages.text: "Möge der tachyonische Wind meine Worte davontragen, mögen die Ozeane der subatomaren Resonanz sie reflektieren, und mögen sie widerhallen, bis die Welt alt wird." {n}Der metallische Körper beginnt zu zucken, und die gesamte Krypta bebt mit. Die Wände wirken von Sekunde zu Sekunde fragiler. Unmögliche Anomalien sind nun darin zu sehen.{/n} "Die Yekhmet-Dynastie sollen verflucht sein!"
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"

traits.locale_text: "Möge der tachyonische Wind meine Worte davontragen, mögen die Ozeane der subatomaren Resonanz sie reflektieren, und mögen sie widerhallen, bis die Welt alt wird." {n}Der metallische Körper beginnt zu zucken, und die gesamte Krypta bebt mit. Die Wände wirken von Sekunde zu Sekunde fragiler. Unmögliche Anomalien sind nun darin zu sehen.{/n} "Die Yekhmet-Dynastie sollen verflucht sein!"

languages.text: "Işıktan hızlı rüzgârlar sözlerimi taşısın, atom altı titreşim okyanusları onları yansıtsın ve sözlerim, dünya yaşlanana kadar yankılansın." {n}Metalik bedeni kasılmalar ele geçiriyor ve mahzen de onunla birlikte sarsılıyor. Geçen her saniyede duvarlar daha da güçsüzleşiyor. Artık içlerinde imkânsız anomaliler kol geziyor.{/n} "Yekhmet hanedanlığı lanetlensin!"
languages.original_text: "May tachyonic wind carry my words, may the oceans of subatomic resonance reflect it, and may it resound until the world grows old." {n}Convulsions begin to affect the metallic body and the entire crypt is quivering along. The walls seem more fragile with each passing second. Impossible anomalies are now rampant in them.{/n} "Let the Yekhmet dynasty be cursed!"
